title: Brier_Thorn的艺作页
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]
摸鱼好久终于整了个艺作页
全都是娘化图

因为时间跨度很大所以完全没有统一风格


+ 条漫
[[collapsible show="+ 682 vs. 524" hide="- 处决试验记录：SCP-524和SCP-682被引进到测试场地。SCP-682狐疑地检查SCP-524，此时SCP-524开始啃咬SCP-682的右前肢。 SCP-682向后跳去，发出咆哮。SCP-524追赶了SCP-682两分钟，此时SCP-682沿着测试室的墙爬上了SCP-524够不着的四(4)米高处。SCP-524停止了追赶并开始用它的爪子洗脸；它持续了这个动作15分钟，期间SCP- 682一直留在墙壁上SCP-524够不着的4米高处。SCP-524跑到测试场地的另一边去，开始破坏收容。测试终止。"]]
[[image https://imglf5.lf127.net/img/bE8ydFcybjV2aEUxeW0xbnIwREpOaFZMVkdLbTlvcXhWM1JpdW80anB5RHlnZnFNRmU3M1dnPT0.jpg?imageView&thumbnail=1680x0&quality=96&stripmeta=0&type=jpg%7Cwatermark&type=2&text=wqkg5ZK46bG8NTc58J-QnyAvIHhpYW55dTU3OTk1NTkyLmxvZnRlci5jb20=&font=bXN5aA==&gravity=southwest&dissolve=30&fontsize=240&dx=8&dy=10&stripmeta=0]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ 基于3999开头的诗的旧版翻译所进行的创作，实际上和3999没有什么关系" hide="- 那么我们走吧，你我两个人。正当那十一日帝国吞噬天空，好似人们融化在早餐桌上的蛤蜊汤里。"]]
[[image https://imglf6.lf127.net/img/bE8ydFcybjV2aEVXbXEzMEkreFVBVnppcnJYZFlKU2Vwa3dzYkRzTnphdWNycTJMY0J3Wkd3PT0.png?imageView&thumbnail=1680x0&quality=96&stripmeta=0%7Cwatermark&type=2&text=wqkg5ZK46bG8NTc58J-QnyAvIHhpYW55dTU3OTk1NTkyLmxvZnRlci5jb20=&font=bXN5aA==&gravity=southwest&dissolve=30&fontsize=340&dx=16&dy=20&stripmeta=0]]
[[image https://imglf4.lf127.net/img/bE8ydFcybjV2aEVXbXEzMEkreFVBUTFGa3N6YjFMdmdYS0o4UGtmRnZVc1NDeU5tQ3B5cEt3PT0.jpg?imageView&thumbnail=1680x0&quality=96&stripmeta=0&type=jpg%7Cwatermark&type=2&text=wqkg5ZK46bG8NTc58J-QnyAvIHhpYW55dTU3OTk1NTkyLmxvZnRlci5jb20=&font=bXN5aA==&gravity=southwest&dissolve=30&fontsize=680&dx=32&dy=36&stripmeta=0]]
[[/collapsible]]

------

------

[[collapsible show="+ 682 x 079" hide="- 重新设计了一下外观"]]
[[image https://imglf6.lf127.net/img/bE8ydFcybjV2aEU3NjF0bHdGUjdsZjV1OS8zV2loN3RwWWtvSmdmZzRuOFA3OFg4Y1owVnl3PT0.jpg?imageView&thumbnail=2829y2000&type=jpg&quality=96&stripmeta=0&type=jpg%7Cwatermark&type=2&text=wqkg5ZK46bG8NTc58J-QnyAvIHhpYW55dTU3OTk1NTkyLmxvZnRlci5jb20=&font=bXN5aA==&gravity=southwest&dissolve=30&fontsize=680&dx=32&dy=36&stripmeta=0]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ 682 x 053" hide="- 内心终日熊熊燃烧着的仇恨火焰熄灭了，脑中不甘叫嚣的怒吼停歇了，不灭的巨蜥终于有了片刻的安宁。"]]
[[image https://imglf3.lf127.net/img/bE8ydFcybjV2aEdTMTMyRDMxL2ltTzJKZm9lL0xFcTJ6Y2p2dGFpZDdtN2Q5WkV4ZjZuU0xnPT0.jpg?imageView&thumbnail=500x0&quality=96&stripmeta=0&type=jpg%7Cwatermark&type=2&text=wqkg5ZK46bG8NTc58J-QnyAvIHhpYW55dTU3OTk1NTkyLmxvZnRlci5jb20=&font=bXN5aA==&gravity=southwest&dissolve=30&fontsize=240&dx=8&dy=10&stripmeta=0]]
[[image https://imglf5.lf127.net/img/bE8ydFcybjV2aEdTMTMyRDMxL2ltSFlkMHk2cGVGcE5SNTdFU0xqUFdQaTQ0YmsrSWIvZGdBPT0.jpg?imageView&thumbnail=500x0&quality=96&stripmeta=0&type=jpg%7Cwatermark&type=2&text=wqkg5ZK46bG8NTc58J-QnyAvIHhpYW55dTU3OTk1NTkyLmxvZnRlci5jb20=&font=bXN5aA==&gravity=southwest&dissolve=30&fontsize=240&dx=8&dy=10&stripmeta=0]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ 682 x 173" hide="- - 笑一个~

别总是一脸凶残嘛682~

- 看到你这张欠揍的脸我怎么可能笑得出来？！

（为美观考虑，省略了682全身的眼睛）"]]
[[image https://imglf5.lf127.net/img/bE8ydFcybjV2aEdxQUZPLzVMVGxmU29aVzdpTDNPaWRnNWtyQVpNd090K0pBRnhldkh4VGRnPT0.jpg?imageView&thumbnail=1680x0&quality=96&stripmeta=0&type=jpg%7Cwatermark&type=2&text=wqkg5ZK46bG8NTc58J-QnyAvIHhpYW55dTU3OTk1NTkyLmxvZnRlci5jb20=&font=bXN5aA==&gravity=southwest&dissolve=30&fontsize=680&dx=32&dy=36&stripmeta=0]]
[[/collapsible]]
